rule: The list of company names must not include any entities that are not explicitly mentioned as companies.
input: Text: According to The Wall Street Journal, Apple and Google are working on improving security features. Employees, including Jane Doe, back these measures.
validityText:
The input provided is a block of text. It includes the names of companies ("Apple" and "Google") and a publication name ("The Wall Street Journal"). It also contains a name of a person ("Jane Doe"). The text discusses a specific topic, which is the improvement of security features by the companies mentioned. This topic is related to the content and presents an overarching theme of collaboration for security enhancements. The text is formatted in a human-readable way and is in English, which is an understandable language. Therefore, the input complies with all the specifications provided, as it adequately contains relevant entities and is presented in the required format.

No violation.
OK
